item.title: CVE-2019-15069|2024-08-05T00:34:53.338Z -- gigastone -- smart%20battery%20a4
item.description: An unsafe authentication interface was discovered in Smart Battery A4, a multifunctional portable charger, firmware version ?<= r1.7.9 . An attacker can bypass authentication without modifying device file and gain web page management privilege.

item.title: CVE-2019-15068|2024-08-05T00:34:53.177Z -- gigastone -- smart%20battery%20a4
item.description: A broken access control vulnerability in Smart Battery A4, a multifunctional portable charger, firmware version ?<= r1.7.9 allows an attacker to get/reset administratorâ€™s password without any authentication.
